VanillaGravshipExpanded.LaunchBoonDef.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, automated sensors picked up strong readings of rare and valuable resources deep beneath the surface.

VanillaGravshipExpanded.LaunchBoonDef.label: perfect trajectory
VanillaGravshipExpanded.LaunchBoonDef.letterText: During the launch of {GRAVSHIP}, {PILOT} executed a flawless flight path calculation, ensuring the ship wasted no motion on its journey. The precise maneuvering drastically reduced fuel usage.

VanillaGravshipExpanded.LaunchBoonDef.label: crew euphoria
VanillaGravshipExpanded.LaunchBoonDef.letterText: The launch of {GRAVSHIP} was so smooth that it left the crew in high spirits. Laughter and celebration echo through the ship's corridors.
